reviewText: My son loves it. Ton of NBA dunk contest history. We love watching this together and will be enjoying for years to come.
If you love basketball you will like this DVD. It brings back memories and tells you the things you may not have known about some of the NBA greats.

The program itself is great but the special features are pretty stupid lots of em have the same highlight in different catergories. Im pretty sure they could have found enough good dunks to not have so many repeats. I would have given it 5 stars but too much of the same thing on the special features.

You get what you pay for. If you are buying this then you like the NBA slam dunk compatision and you get the greatest dunks from that in this DVD.

I like it

This was a very fun DVD with plenty of exciting and historical footage. From Dwight Howard in his Superman cape to the fun rivalry between Jordan and 'Nique, plenty of great moments are captured in this DVD. Short, to the point, and worth the money!!!
Great DVD...
Grand son loved this
Very entertaining video. Great for fans of the game past and present!
Great documentary
expected less narration and more of each live contest. But overall , was pretty good.
9 year old son loves this. watched over and over.
This was awesome!  To see how the dunk contest has grown through the years and to witness the athleticism of these players blossom was just unbelievable. My family was truly entertained.
Son love these he said they are great
I didn't get a chance to finish all of it but what I saw was pretty good.
thanks
THIS ITEM IS A KEEPER. THANK YOU.
"Best Of The Slam Dunk Contest" is great! It brings back memories of what The Dunk Contest was back in the day.
cool.
Awesome...
Fun, short video, average production
very interesting, I like it from start to finish.
The slam dunk contest used to be something you look forward to during the NBA all star weekend. Watch this to see why.
Pretty much any memorable dunk at contest was reviewed. I did like the story lines leading to some contestants participation in the slam dunk contest.
Got it for the boyfriend! He loves basketball and loved the dvd, watched it a couple times with him it was good

This got a 5 star from me because there is nothing like having the NBA'S  slam dunks at your disposal. My husband would watch them on YouTube, but it only last for a few minutes. This DVD gives him an hour of the best of the best. He is a happy guy with this one.
I really liked seeing a lot of the old slam dunk winners on this DVD.  It was the main reason I bought it.  Great DVD.
Watching these contests are just FUN - watching them with your buddies is 10 times the fun!  Lots of good memories for the old guys, and lots of good 'wow' material for the young ones...
THIS IS TRULY THE "BEST OF THE NBA SLAM DUNK CONTEST"! THERE WERE SO MANY STARS THAT HOLLYWOOD HAD NOTHING ON THEM.THE BATTLES IN ALL THE FINALS WAS BY FAR THE BEST EVER!
The picture quality was very grainy and a little blurry. Wish it was in HD.  Then i would've given it 5 stars
My son is 9 and LOVES basketball!  This is a great DVD and that has all the classic dunks!!!  He loved it!
This DVD is exciting and true to the product description given.  I enjoyed the fact that the players are current.

Very up-to-date (made in 2011) yet has A LOT of the 1986 contest dunks of Spud Webb, and many others from previous years including Dr. J. from 1976 onward.

Lots of dunks, nearly all showed "live" and then again in replay, and lots of good (current) interviews of the players.

Well put-together production (the credits are massively long)--a VERY professionally done show-- with great music, too.  Mostly in film, not (preferred) video, but the film is sharp.

A+!
Once again I ordered this for the family and we watched it four tims already and every time one of sons friend come over it on the tv.
I recommend this video; it shows a lot of great dunks.  It brought back memories of Jordan vs. Wilkens and showed some newer dunk competitions between current players.
Very entertaining video with highlights. My husband and I both enjoyed this a lot. Really cool to see some amazing feats!
AWSOME!!!
awesome video
I like it
I love watching the fun and comradarie among the veteran players!! Watching this dvd makes me feel like I am actually present at the event! I miss the good old days!
Just always fun to watch
Fun to watch
My son and I enjoyed watching this together.
We enjoyed the past stars mixed in with today's present NBA stars.
Good stuff
GREAT
